basics.name: Katelyn Sung
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.A. in Creative Computational Media in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2026.

education.area: Computer Science: Creative Computational Media (expected Spring, 2026)

work.summary: Managed the flow and organization of the busiest CPK in the world
highlights: Organize and work with many differnt people, in a fast paced environment
Efficiently and accuratley deliver orders and top tier customer service.
Communicate with tourists in different languages such as Korean and Japanese

Maintain the public park, creating newer paths
